home.title: Praga Caput Regni Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Peter Parler, the Solo Mode opponent of Praga Caput Regni.
home.play2: This helper application replaces card deck and provides help inside the app. It's possible to play against multiple bots.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
